sections.description: A Wordpress Plugin to integrate Apidae with twig templates and shortcodes
sections.installation:
You will need an active Apidae account to use this plugin,
Get the Project ID and Api Key from this account and enter them in the Apidae Settings Menu
Create a template for a list and a template for single objects
Insert the single object shortcode in a page of your choice first and then the list shortcode in another page and admire the beauty
